jd: From: Manohar, IT Americas INC manohar@itamerica.com Reply to: manohar@itamerica.com Job Title: Sr Java/Spring Boot Developer Location:*100% Onsite Day 1 - Woonsocket, RI *****Local candidates ONLY**** Interview Process: 1 internal video call + 1 client video call + 1 F2F client interview in Woonsocket, RI Job Summary:• Maintain high-quality software solutions using Java• Spring Boot, Rest, Microservices, JPA, JPOS, Docker,• Have excellent communication skills to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders. Experience: 8+ years Required Skills: 1. Java 2. Spring boot, Microservices 3. JPA, Docker 4. Cloud (any will work AWS, GCP, Azure etc.) Nice to have skills:• Good knowledge on JVM internals and capable of profiling already built services for performance bottlenecks – preferred • Experience in building highly memory safe and secure Java applications which can be run on resource constraint devices – preferred • JPOS/PCI device Experience - Preferred Healthcare domain experience is nice to have Previous CVS experience is nice to have and must include the following on resumes:-CVS manager name-CVS ID Responsibilities:• Implement best practices in software development to ensure high-quality code and efficient performance. –• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and analyse requirements for new features and enhancements.• Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior developers to foster a collaborative and productive team environment.• Conduct code reviews to ensure adherence to coding standards and identify areas for improvement.• Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues to ensure smooth operation of software applications.• Participate in the design and architecture of scalable and robust software systems.
